question: What could be done in the case when a teacher is compelling u to draw some animations of living beings?
answer:
QUESTION
I have a sister who goes to high school and her teacher has asked her to draw some animations which include living beings, as birds or even humans. my question is that if her teacher doesnt allow any other option in this matter so what should she do???. she has to pass that class too. we r really worried so if u could reply it soon it will be a great help. jazak ALLAH khair
ANSWER


Share:
We suggest that a written request be sent to the principal of the school
requesting an exemption based on one's religious convictions. If that is
unsuccessful, then your sister will be excused.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
